    PcapHandler.PacketSink.PcapPacketSink

    Methods in org.jnetpcap that return PcapHandler.PacketSink
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PcapHandler.PacketSink
    Pcap.inject()
    Returns a compatible packet sink which sends the packets to whatever sink the Pcap handle is opened to.
    PcapHandler.PacketSink
    Pcap.sendPacket()
    Returns a compatible packet sink which sends the packets to whatever sink the Pcap handle is opened to.
